# ğŸ¬ TubeHarvest Wiki

Welcome to the **TubeHarvest** documentation! TubeHarvest is a comprehensive YouTube downloader with a beautiful interactive console interface.

![TubeHarvest Banner](https://img.shields.io/badge/TubeHarvest-YouTube%20Downloader-red?style=for-the-badge&logo=youtube)

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ¥ **Download YouTube videos** in various formats (MP4, MP3, WebM, MKV, M4A)
- ğŸ“± **Beautiful interactive console** with Rich UI components
- ğŸ¯ **Multiple quality options** (4K, 1080p, 720p, 480p, etc.)
- ğŸ“‹ **Playlist support** with batch downloading
- ğŸµ **Audio-only downloads** for music extraction
- ğŸ“ **Subtitle downloads** with automatic language detection
- ğŸ·ï¸ **Metadata extraction** and custom filename support
- âš¡ **Multi-threaded downloads** for faster performance
- ğŸ¨ **Progress tracking** with real-time statistics

## ğŸš€ Quick Examples

### Basic Download
```bash
# Download a single video
python -m tubeharvest -u "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID"

# Launch interactive mode
python -m tubeharvest -i
```

### Advanced Usage
```bash
# Download playlist in MP3 format
python -m tubeharvest -u "PLAYLIST_URL" -f mp3 --audio-only

# Custom quality and filename
python -m tubeharvest -u "VIDEO_URL" -q 1080 --filename "my_video"
```
